701637f-a.title: Bronx: Poplar Street - Williamsbridge Road
701637f-a.text:
Poplar Street (extreme right), at Williamsbridge Road (foreground,
not seen). The view is northeastward along the tracks of the New York,
New Haven and Hartford Railroad and shows its Westchester station. The
location of the station house is about 50 feet north of Poplar Street,
between Williamsbridge and Eastchester Roads.
August 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
